nodes.text: Deron Cadoruso was a male Human Mandalorian who lived during the Galactic War. He and his Mandalorians joined with the Order of Revan when Revan returned during the Galactic War. In honor of the friendship and loyalty between Mandalore the Preserver and Revan, Deron and his warriors wore red Mandalorian armor that was in the image of the Mand'alor. During the Battle of Yavin 4, he and his men were killed during the fighting.
Deron Cadoruso appeared as one of the bosses in "Temple of Sacrifice" in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, in the 2014 Digital Expansion Shadow of Revan.
